# # numom_IPSI 

This repository contains example code for a paper entitled "Incremental Propensity Estimation for Time-Fixed Exposures" by Ashley I Naimi and colleagues.

The repository includes the following:

* A program to reproduce all results for the main and supplementary material

This work was supported by NIH Grants R01 HD093602, and NSF DMS Grant #1810979.
